div.p: No. 6423, vol. 1875 G, VPRS 1168/P inward correspondence registers, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.

Letter not found; item is a register entry only, of a requisition dated 11 June 1875.
[Requisition for one copy of his works as far as available for Dr Berggren]
This requisition was approved and forwarded to the Premier's office on 15 June 1875.Berggren was on an extended tour and met M in Melbourne on 11 June 1875, see M to J. Agardh, 13 June 1875 (in this edition as 75-06-13b).It is not known what works were supplied,butsee notes to M to R. Ramsay 24 January 1875 (in this edition as 75-01-24a); volume 8 of Fragmenta (B75.04.06), may also have been available to present before 26 JunewhenBerggren left for Sydney.
